title: [Banthal's Magic Shoppe]
[Banthal's Weaponry]
[Banthal's Outfitting]
[Banthal's Armory]
description: Iridescent crystal walls rise from a sparkling crystal floor.  Just above an elegantly dressed maiden statue hangs a wrinkled parchment gown pattern, and a ceiling of jagged crystals completes the picture.  A narrow glass-topped table stands in the middle of the room.
